meanings.definition: Circulating as an unverified report or story.
meanings.sent1: The rumored treasure hidden in the old castle excited the townspeople.
meanings.sent2: The rumored new student in class turned out to be friendly and kind.
meanings.sent3: The rumored ghost haunting the abandoned house was just a mischievous cat.
meanings.sent4: The rumored monster under the bed was actually just a pile of clothes.
meanings.sent5: The rumored UFO sighting turned out to be a group of glowing balloons.

meanings.definition: Gossiped about; discussed in a speculative way.
meanings.sent1: The rumored relationship between the two actors caused a stir in the tabloids.
meanings.sent2: The rumored party at the mayor's house turned out to be a surprise birthday celebration.
meanings.sent3: The rumored alien invasion was just a prank by the mischievous students.
meanings.sent4: The rumored treasure map led to a thrilling adventure in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rumored ghost story kept the campers up all night with fear.
